attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to ban the use of the Google Glass device recording the general population in public area's throughout the whole UK.

Google Glass is a device that has the ability to take photos and record 720p HD video by the wearer.

This can be done without other peoples consent and the images may then be uploaded onto social media sites and sites such as YouTube.

The government should pass a law to ban such activity within the UK with immediate effect.

Your private life is not for public consumption on the internet without your strict consent. If you agree then please sign this petition.

rejection.details: There are laws against what is allowable on the internet, or other media.
